| L | C | R |
|:--|:-:|--:|
| a | b | c |
| 1 | 2 | 3 |

|  A     |    B|   C    |
| :---   | ---:   |  :-: |
|   x    |   42    |  y   |

| item | cell |
| --- | --- |
| ampersand | A & B |
| percent | 100% |
| dollar | $100 |
| hash | #1 |
| underscore | a_b |
| braces | {x} |
| tilde | ~user |
| caret | x^2 |
| backslash | C:\path\file |

|  | h2 | h3 |
| --- | --- | --- |
| v1 | v2 | v3 |

| a | b | c |
| --- | --- | --- |
| 1 |  | 3 |
|  | 2 |  |

| a | b | c |
| --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | 2 |
| 3 | 4 | 5 | 6 |

> | a | b |
> | --- | --- |
> | 1 | 2 |

- before

  | a | b |
  | --- | --- |
  | 1 | 2 |

- after

```
| a | b |
| --- | --- |
| 1 | 2 |
```

| a | b |

| 1 | 2 |
